sentences.english: I asked myself, in an isolated corner of the campus.
sentences.chinese: 我一遍又遍地诘问自己，在校园孤零的一角。

sentences.english: The witness was cross-examined by the defending counsel.
sentences.chinese: 证人受到辩护律师的诘问。

sentences.english: The witness remained collected throughout the cross-examination.
sentences.chinese: 证人在整个反诘问过程中保持着镇静自若。

sentences.english: The spokesman was completely discombobulated by the hecklers.
sentences.chinese: 发言人完全被诘问者扰乱了。

sentences.english: Sandberg says they asked each other, “What do you believe?
sentences.chinese: 桑德伯格说他们互相诘问对方，“你相信什么？

sentences.english: The Socialist candidate was heckled continuously.
sentences.chinese: 社会党候选人不断受到诘问。

sentences.english: The reproached coach unloaded the loaves to the approachable roadside.
sentences.chinese: 受到诘问诘责的教练把面包卸到可接近的路旁。

sentences.english: The prosecution lawyer cross-examined the defence witness.
sentences.chinese: 控方律师诘问被告一方的证人。

sentences.english: No matter how the reporters heckled him the speaker always had an answer to come back with.
sentences.chinese: 不论记者如何诘问，发言人总能对答如流。

definition: to ask (a question) in reply/to answer a question with a question/rhetorical question
to question/to ask questions/to inquire/to bring to account/to interrogate
to question/to ask/to raise a question
to criticize harshly/to denounce/to attack viciously
to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
